title: Full Conversation
description: Practice a full B1-entry conversation mixing work, plans, emotions, and small narratives.

steps.teacher: A：你今天看起來有點累，還好嗎？
expected_answer: 你今天看起來有點累，還好嗎？
steps.pinyin: A: nǐ jīn tiān kàn qǐ lái yǒu diǎn lèi, hái hǎo ma?
steps.english_hint: You look a bit tired today, are you okay?

steps.teacher: B：還好，只是最近事情有點多。
expected_answer: 還好，只是最近事情有點多。
steps.pinyin: B: hái hǎo, zhǐ shì zuì jìn shì qíng yǒu diǎn duō.
steps.english_hint: I'm okay, just a bit busy lately.

steps.pinyin: A: xū yào wǒ bāng máng ma?

steps.teacher: B：謝謝，我正在整理資料，應該快好了。
expected_answer: 謝謝，我正在整理資料，應該快好了。
steps.pinyin: B: xiè xie, wǒ zhèng zài zhěng lǐ zī liào, yīng gāi kuài hǎo le.
steps.english_hint: Thanks, I'm organizing the data—it should be done soon.

steps.teacher: A：對了，你上次說的專案進展如何？
expected_answer: 對了，你上次說的專案進展如何？
steps.pinyin: A: duì le, nǐ shàng cì shuō de zhuān àn jìn zhǎn rú hé?
steps.english_hint: By the way, how is the project you mentioned last time?

steps.teacher: B：比我想像的順利，我已經完成第一階段了。
expected_answer: 比我想像的順利，我已經完成第一階段了。
steps.pinyin: B: bǐ wǒ xiǎng xiàng de shùn lì, wǒ yǐ jīng wán chéng dì yī jiē duàn le.
steps.english_hint: It's smoother than I expected; I've finished the first stage.

steps.teacher: A：太好了！你有打算怎麼進行下一步嗎？
expected_answer: 太好了！你有打算怎麼進行下一步嗎？
steps.pinyin: A: tài hǎo le! nǐ yǒu dǎ suàn zěn me jìn xíng xià yí bù ma?
steps.english_hint: That's great! Do you have plans for the next step?

steps.teacher: B：我想先蒐集更多意見，再做調整。
expected_answer: 我想先蒐集更多意見，再做調整。
steps.pinyin: B: wǒ xiǎng xiān sōu jí gèng duō yì jiàn, zài zuò tiáo zhěng.
steps.english_hint: I want to gather more opinions first, then make adjustments.

steps.teacher: A：聽起來很周全，需要我幫你問問其他人嗎？
expected_answer: 聽起來很周全，需要我幫你問問其他人嗎？
steps.pinyin: A: tīng qǐ lái hěn zhōu quán, xū yào wǒ bāng nǐ wèn wèn qí tā rén ma?
steps.english_hint: Sounds thorough. Want me to help ask others?

steps.teacher: B：好啊，那太棒了，謝謝你的幫忙！
expected_answer: 好啊，那太棒了，謝謝你的幫忙！
steps.pinyin: B: hǎo a, nà tài bàng le, xiè xie nǐ de bāng máng!
steps.english_hint: Sure, that would be great. Thanks for your help!

review.summary: You completed a full B1-entry conversation mixing emotion, work, planning, and narrative elements.
review.mission: Ready for CHAPTER 10 (B1 level, slightly harder, more natural and fluent)?
